banner_image_url.description: image used in the banner for the collection

external_link.description: external link to the original website for the collection

payment_tokens.description: the payment tokens accepted for this collection

payout_address.description: payout address for the collection's royalties

primary_asset_contracts.description: a list of the contracts associated with this collection

safelist_request_status.description: the collection's approval status on OpenSea

seller_fees.description: the fees that get paid out when a sale is made

stats.description: sales statistics associated with the collection

traits.description: listing of all the trait types available within this collection
